title: Levkovich indicates less bullish outlook.
summary: In an appearance on CNBC, Citi's Chief US Equity Strategist Tobias Levkovich discusses factors weighing on stocks including summer seasonality, the end of the Fed's program of quantitative easing, a slowdown in growth rates and earnings, and the U.S. deficit.
tag-2: In an appearance on CNBC, Citi's Chief US Equity Strategist Tobias Levkovich discusses factors weighing on stocks including summer seasonality, the end of the Fed's program of quantitative easing, a slowdown in growth rates and earnings, and the U.S. deficit.
